# [Interview #576, Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=576#16)

#### [Matthías Páll (8 November 2010)](http://twitter.com/tritlo/status/1717128054968320)

Will we see more from Shara or the Land of the Madmen?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (8 November 2010)](http://twitter.com/BrandonSandrson/status/1719910497521664)

RJ said there would be no major action in Shara. He was uncertain on Madmen.
